name: Toffee Bar Cheesecake
author: Dania
summary: A rich cheese cake with chocolate and caramel bits. Goes great with a nightcap.
ingredients: 7 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered toffee bar, crushed
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
In a small bowl, stir together the graham cracker crumbs and 1/2 cup sugar
Add the melted butter and mix well
Press into the bottom of a 9 inch springform pan
Cover the outside of the pan with foil to make it waterproof
In a large bowl, cream together the cream cheese and 1 cup sugar until soft and smooth
Stir in the lemon juice and vanilla
Scrape the bottom of the bowl occasionally with a spatula to prevent lumps
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then fold in the toffee bits
Pour the batter into the prepared pan
Place the foil covered pan into a larger cake pan or any pan with at least 1 inch tall sides
Put into the oven, then fill the larger pan with water, creating a water bath
Bake for 90 minutes in the preheated oven, checking after 45 minutes to refill the water bath
After 90 minutes, turn off the oven and leave the cake inside for about an hour
Chill at least 4 hours before removing from pan
